queries.text:
from(bucket: "HiveOS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RIG1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["GPU"] == "0" or r["GPU"] == "2" or r["GPU"] == "1" or r["GPU"] == "3" or r["GPU"] == "4" or r["GPU"] == "5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power.draw")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "HiveOS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RIG1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["GPU"] == "5" or r["GPU"] == "4" or r["GPU"] == "3" or r["GPU"] == "2" or r["GPU"] == "1" or r["GPU"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pstate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
